refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: RefMeta holds the title of the reference page, the number of the volume in which this reference page occurs, and possibly other miscellaneous information (typically used in printing the reference page).

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: Most of the elements contained in RefMeta are used in presentation, but they are not generally printed as part of the formatting of the RefMeta wrapper--it merely serves to identify where they occur.
